//Main Activity Strings Refresh About
//About Activity Strings Home This app searches for smart devices and attempts to connect with them. Once connected, the app will then send and receive information between the app and the device. Using the app, the user should then be able to perform functions such as turning the device off/on and monitoring power usage to name a couple. More functions are available for the user. ~Created by Randy Luong, Josiah Moreno, and Nicholas Murray
